body: This metal helm is made to look like the wearer has large fangs and other features resembling those of a fearsome predator. If the wearer is a barbarian, she can use the intimidating glare rage power whenever she rages. The helm has no effect if the wearer is not a barbarian (or another class with the rage class feature).
name: Helm of Fearsome Mien
